definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: All right. So we have that square root NR.
sentences.chinese: 好，看看这个NR求平方根方法。

sentences.english: You have square root of minus one for something else.
sentences.chinese: 你得到了某个负数的平方根。

sentences.english: Generally, the reduction falls as the square root of the number of terms in the series.
sentences.chinese: 通常，缩减量随着系列中术语的数量的平方根下降。

sentences.english: Or, it could act like a square root machine.
sentences.chinese: 或者，它可以表现的像个开平方根的机器。

sentences.english: Having found all square roots of an identity matrix.
sentences.chinese: 找出了单位矩阵的所有平方根。

sentences.english: A new combining algorithm of decentralized square root information filtering for linear discrete-time systems is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究一种新的分散信息平方根滤波算法。

sentences.english: You also send a fault response if someone requests the square root of a negative number.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人请求负数的平方根，也将发送错误响应。
乌黑的恶性平方根的迹象？

sentences.english: The square root of nine is three.
Is the square root ever going to be less than 0?
sentences.chinese: 一个数的平方根会小于0么？

sentences.english: A simple workaround is to use an animated value as the square root of the destination value.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单的变通方法是用带动画价值的平方根目的值。

sentences.english: The square root of two times 15.15.

sentences.chinese: 现在我要求一下16的平方根。

sentences.english: In this paper, some problems concerning the integral parts of square roots are solved.
sentences.chinese: 解决了有关平方根整数部分的几个问题。

sentences.english: How much is one over two times the square usu'sly root of pi?
sentences.chinese: 圆周率的平方根的二分之一是多少？

definition: a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
